mods.note: I WATER SUPPLY. 7' : 1 — l/Ir. Pradhan Singh, the State Engineer, with Ibrahim Muhammed Uaqib of the Sultan’s Retinue at the Jirziz spring head.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: 1 black and white photographDimensions: 139 x 86mm, on sheet 331 x 202mm

mods.abstract: Photograph of Pradhan Singh, State Engineer, with Ibrahim Muhammad, Naqib of the Sultan of Muscat and Oman's Retinue, at the Jirziz spring head, Dhofar.This photograph is part of a series of photographs that appear at the end of a preliminary report on the land resources of Dhofar, produced by Brian Joseph Hartley, Director of Agriculture, Aden, and dated 20 March 1948.
